channel.title: Fortress of the Ancients [CastleWars remake!]
channel.description:
Hello :D
I have been developing a battleground :P But I think I need to do some testing.....
The battleground has the following functions: 5 rank system (kill players to gain ranks) at rank 2: you gain "technical plans" - Technical plans allow you to jump onto the castle walls! at rank 3: you gain a Fixed Device (A shoulder cannon if you will.) at rank 4 and 5 your cannon damage increases also at rank 5 you gain a title :D (Warlord) which appears when you use the ::yell (or just "/" :P just like clan chat - when using the right client)
So if you wish to try this (and perhaps want the code) just PM me or comment here that you want to join :D and we can all test this together ^^

item.title: Fortress of the Ancients [CastleWars remake!]
item.dc:creator: @fuzzout fuzzout
item.description:
@fuzzout wrote:

Hello

I have been developing a battleground
But I think I need to do some testing…

The battleground has the following functions:
5 rank system (kill players to gain ranks)
at rank 2: you gain “technical plans” - Technical plans allow you to jump onto the castle walls!
at rank 3: you gain a Fixed Device (A shoulder cannon if you will.)
at rank 4 and 5 your cannon damage increases
also at rank 5 you gain a title (Warlord) which appears when you use the ::yell (or just “/” just like clan chat - when using the right client)

So if you wish to try this (and perhaps want the code) just PM me or comment here that you want to join and we can all test this together ^^

Read full topic
